original_title: DFCC Junior Creative Till Competition unleashes kids’ creativity
original_body_lines: DFCC Bank recently held its Junior Creative Till Competition to raise awareness among kids about the importance of saving, whilst sparking their creativity. Featured here are some of the unique and creative tills brought to life by the talented kids who participated. The DFCC Junior Children’s savings account is DFCC Bank’s flagship minor savings account that provides numerous rewards and activities to help kids get excited about saving. DFCC Bank is committed to promoting saving habits and financial responsibility amongst Sri Lanka’s future generations!
